sense.def:
One's eyes
sta organa na obrazu, s katerima gledamo.

To have an eye for something
pomeni, da znamo nekaj prepoznati in dobro oceniti.

To eye something
pomeni nekaj gledati pozorno ali sumničavo.

seg.quote: Posy was eyeing the man thoughtfully.

sense.def:
To cast one's eye over something
ali
to run one's eye over something
pomeni na hitro pogledati vse dele nečesa.

seg.quote: He ran his eye over the article.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
catches one's eye
, nekdo tisto nenadoma opazi.

seg.quote: The flowers in your window caught my eye.

sense.def:
To try to catch someone's eye
pomeni truditi se, da bi pritegnili pozornost neke osebe.

Kadar nekdo
has one's eye on someone
, nekoga opazuje in ocenjuje.

Če je nekaj resnično
in someone's eyes
, je zanj resnično.

seg.quote: Her children could do no wrong in her eyes.

sense.def:
To keep an eye on someone or something
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj opazovati in skrbeti, da je na varnem.

seg.quote: Can you keep an eye on the baby while I go shopping?

sense.def:
Izrek:
there is more to a situation than meets the eye
, pomeni, da so neke okoliščine bolj zapletene, kot je sprva kazalo.

Če neki dogodek
opens one's eyes
, človeka opozori, da je nekaj drugačno, kot je sprva mislil.

Kadar človek
doesn't see eye to eye with someone
, se z nekom ne strinja.

To be up to one's eyes in something
pomeni biti zelo zaposlen z nečim.

seg.quote: Sal is still up to her eyes in kids and housework.
